Attacks.Name: Wrap
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Stagger special condition.

Attacks.Name: Dragon Breath
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Hex special condition.

Attacks.Name: Aqua Jet
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Superpowers.Name: Shed Skin
Superpowers.Effect: Roll one die. On a result (crit, wild, or hit), remove one special condition from this character.

Attacks.Name: Twister
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Stagger special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Dragonair character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
